name: Psychoserker
description:
Fight and pillage for the glory of your ancestors and the chance to reach Valhalla!

As a Viking berserker, you hack, slash, roll, and trip? your way through endless ranks of enemies. Take drugs to enhance your abilities and enter the infamous berserker rage, but be careful, the more drugs you take, the crazier things get!

This game was created in less than 72 hours as a solo project for the Ludum Dare 40 jam. This was my first Ludum Dare. It was a blast!

Controls:

Gamepad:

Left Stick - move, select drug

Right Stick - rotate, click to open drug menu and release to consume selected drug

Right Trigger - Attack

Left Trigger - Backstep or Dash

A - pick up weapon

Mouse and keyboard: 

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Left click - Attack

Right click - hold to open drug menu, drag to select a drug, release to consume selected drug

Space - pick up weapon

Shift - Dash
